abstract: The General Motors Corporation said Wednesday that its global sales fell 11.4 percent in the third quarter.
snippet: The General Motors Corporation said Wednesday that its global sales fell 11.4 percent in the third quarter.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  The General Motors Corporation said Wednesday that its global sales fell 11.4 percent in the third quarter, increasing the likelihood that G.M. would lose its title as the world’s largest automaker to Toyota this year.

headline.main: G.M. Faces a Fall to No. 2 as Global Sales Slip
headline.print_headline: G.M. Faces a Fall to No. 2 as Global Sales Slip
